Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The crude rate of VTE per 10 , 000 woman - years was 4 . 10 in current users of any OC , 3 . 10 in users of second - generation OCs , and 4 . 96 in users of third - generation preparations .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| VTE |
| OC |
| second-generation OCs |
| third-generation preparations |

The entities in the paragraph that refer to diseases are:

1. VTE (Venous Thromboembolism)
2. OC (Oral Contraceptives)
3. second-generation OCs
4. third-generation preparations

Note that "OC" and its variations (second-generation OCs, third-generation preparations) are not diseases, but they are mentioned in the context of the paragraph as types of medication that may increase the risk of VTE. Therefore, they are not included in the table as "Disease" entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| VTE |

The only entity that clearly refers to a disease in the given paragraph is "VTE" (Venous Thromboembolism).
